channel.title: Wth!
channel.description: whats going on, I try loggnig on to a server but every time it tells me the server must be done and to make my own, and now when I make my own It wont let me do anything before it disconetcs and when I summon monsters I hit a 0 and then they die, and when I make a server there is nothing to kill no where except in varok, and there its only a couple of gaurds, noting in the wild nowhere except varok help please

item.title: Wth!
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

If you want to spawn Npcs in places:

  1. Open Autospawn.cfg
  2. Add something like this above your others
spawn = NPCID	XCords	YCoods	HEIGHT	0	0	0	0	1	MonsterName

This is an example

spawn = 2745	2401	5084	0	0	0	0	0	1	Jad

To make monster have different HP

  1. Open NPC.cfg
  2. Search for the Name of the Monster, like
King_Black_Dragon

Itâ€™ll say something like this

npc = 50	King_black_dragon		276	200

276 is the Combat
200 is the hp
Change 200 to whatever you want the hp to be, and your good.

Read full topic

item.title: Wth!

item.description:
